Package bropals.lib.simplegame.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetLoader<T>
    Super class for all asset loaders.
    AssetManager
    Loads and keeps track of assets.
    BinaryFileStorage<T>
    Reads and writes to files via a binary stream.
    BufferedImageLoader
    Loads BufferedImages.
    MusicLoader
    Loads Music objects for playing long audio files.
    PropertiesReader
    Reads text files that are in property, value format.
    SoundEffectLoader
    Loads SoundEffects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KeyAlreadyUsedException
    An exception used by AssetLoader
